attributes.action: remove the current statue on the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square and replace it with a statue of HM Queen Elizabeth II or any other great Briton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current statue on the fourth plinth is a ghastly sight, it has no place in one of the finest landmarks in Western Europe and the wider world. It should be replaced with a statue of someone who really means something to the British public
